thread.title: HOT Buy 1 Get 1 FREE Beauty & the Beast Tickets + EXTRA $5 Off = 2 Tickets Starting at $4.41 Shipped
thread.title_full: HOT Buy 1 Get 1 FREE Beauty & the Beast Tickets + EXTRA $5 Off = 2 Tickets Starting at $4.41 Shipped

author: Erica (Silly Sidekick)
title: HOT Buy 1 Get 1 FREE Beauty & the Beast Tickets + EXTRA $5 Off = 2 Tickets Starting at $4.41 Shipped
text:
Plan on seeing Beauty & the Beast?
For a limited time, Atom Tickets is hosting a Buy 1 Get 1 FREE sale on Beauty & the Beast Tickets – NO promo code needed (discount will apply at checkout)! AND, if that’s not sweet enough, you can also enter the promo code 5OFF at checkout to snag an additional $5 off!
To take advantage of this offer, head here , log in or create an account with Atom Tickets, choose a theater near you, click on a showtime, enter your payment information and then use the code 5OFF .
Head over here to find a participating theater near you. 
As a deal idea, I added 1 adult ticket and 1 child ticket to my cart, entered the promo code 5OFF and my total came out to just $4.41 for BOTH adult tickets (just $2.20 per ticket)… so awesome ! OR – you buy 2 adult tickets for as low as $5.37 – just $2.69 per ticket!
